bike.description: Platinum Series aluminum, G2 Geometry, butted TT & DT, cold-forged dropouts & BB

components.description: Fox F100RL, 100mm travel, custom G2 Geometry 46mm offset crown, air spring, external rebound adjustment
Shimano M525 w/M570 (LX) freehub/sealed front hub, Bontrager Duster tubeless ready* 28mm wide disc rims, 32h
Bontrager XDX, 26 x 2.1 (55/53), tubeless ready, 120 TPI aramid folding bead
Bontrager Race Lite, hollow cromoly rails
Bontrager Race Lite, Infinite Adjust Head, 27.2mm
Bontrager Race Lite Big Sweep, 640mm width, 12d sweep, 31.8mm
Bontrager Race X Lite OS, 7d rise, 31.8mm
Avid Juicy 5, hydraulic disc, 160mm G2 Clean Sweep 6-bolt rotors
